name: Attack of the Gigant Zombie vs Unity chan
description: Retro-styled 3D action game. Explore places, battle against monsters to be stronger, beat the boss monsters to obtain powerful attacks, and finally defeat Gigant Zombie. You can also decorate your house!!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
